author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Coronation Street spoilers Bethany to be surrounded by abusive men in shock Corrie sex ring scene | Metro News

organizations.name: metro news search metro follow us coronation street

text:
Search Metro Follow us Coronation Street spoilers: ‘Uncomfortable’ scene ahead as Bethany Platt is surrounded by abusive men in sex ring storyline Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 11:46 am (Picture: ITV) 
Coronation Street fans have been significantly unsettled by recent scenes as Bethany Platt heads for an abusive sex ring storyline – but things are about to get even darker as actress Lucy Fallon was warned of a particularly uncomfortable scene which will see the teen surrounded by abusive older men in Nathan’s apartment. 
Older man Nathan has been grooming vulnerable Bethany and she currently thinks that she is his girlfriend in a perfectly normal and healthy relationship. The reality is much more sinister, with Nathan preparing the youngster to be sexually exploited in a harrowing story that seeks to raise awareness of the prevalent abuse young people face. 
Speaking about the scene ahead, Lucy said that it was ‘uncomfortable to film’ but also spoke out about the importance of not shying away from such grim scenes: ‘It’s so important for it to be on, especially at this time, because we’re targeting young viewers watching before watershed – it’s so important to target those people.’ (Picture: ITV) 
Lucy added that she hasn’t felt able to watch the scenes herself but Coronation Street has been praised by charities for taking on the difficult subject matter and raising awareness of it to millions of TV viewers. 
In upcoming scenes, Sarah will grow concerned about her daughter’s boyfriend and will arrange to meet him – but will Nathan manage to talk Sarah round and persuade her that he is no danger to Bethany?
